a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child deaths in the first 5 years of life by age group, World, 1990 to 2019
Number of children who died before reaching the age of five. Shown by the time period in which they died.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
